duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, execute, and activate end-to-end research in collaboration with stakeholders and UX team.
Partner with Research vendors to execute critical research and create user research roadmaps.
Apply human-centered design thinking to impact all stages of UX Research design development.
Gather stakeholder needs, scope, and execute on Qualitative/Quantitative research, and communicate findings.
Guide and create user research roadmaps and activate insights to help solve key problems with internal/external users.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in HCI, Statistics, User Experience Research, Psychology, Sociology, Anthropology, Philosophy, Business preferred. (Master’s or Ph.D. in related fields preferred)
